metadata.title: CVE-2019-9658 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Certified (focal) - medium
metadata.description:
Checkstyle before 8.18 loads external DTDs by default.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-9658` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

checkstyle - 8.26-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: checkstyle package in focal, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '8.26-1').
